Description: Pottery shabti of Djed-Khonsu(?), a Wʿb-priest of Amun(?) with a lappet-wig, a modelled face and crossed arms in relief holding two relief hoes; the front of the remaining leg section is inscribed with a column of black painted Hieroglyphs(worn); the surface has worn from the back and the lower leg section has broken away.
Condition: incomplete - lower leg section missing, surface worn from back
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
